document.full_text: the nhl has fined boston bruins defenseman andrew ference $2,500 for making an obscene gesture to the crowd in montreal.
document.title: nhl fines bruins' ference $2,500 for obscene gesture
lines_and_colors: the nhl has fined boston bruins defenseman andrew ference $2,500 for making an obscene gesture to the crowd in montreal.
